SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[BankId], [c].[BaslangicTarihi], [c].[BitisTarihi], [c].[CreditType], [c].[Description], [c].[FaizOrani], [c].[MaxKrediTutar], [c].[MaxVade], [c].[MinKrediTutar], [c].[MinVade], [c].[RecordTime], [b].[Id], [b].[Name]
FROM [Campaigns] AS [c]

SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[BankId], [c].[BaslangicTarihi], [c].[BitisTarihi], [c].[CreditType], [c].[Description], [c].[FaizOrani], [c].[MaxKrediTutar], [c].[MaxVade], [c].[MinKrediTutar], [c].[MinVade], [c].[RecordTime], [b].[Id], [b].[Name]
FROM [Campaigns] AS [c]
